jakarta.json.JsonMergePatch

Packages that use JsonMergePatch
Package
Description
jakarta.json
Provides an object model API to process JSON.
jakarta.json.spi
Service Provider Interface (SPI) to plug in implementations for JSON processing objects.

  • Uses of JsonMergePatch in jakarta.json

    Methods in jakarta.json that return JsonMergePatch
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static JsonMergePatch
    Json.createMergeDiff(JsonValue source, JsonValue target)
    Generates a JSON Merge Patch (RFC 7396) from the source and target JsonValues which when applied to the source, yields the target.
    static JsonMergePatch
    Json.createMergePatch(JsonValue patch)
    Creates JSON Merge Patch (RFC 7396) from specified JsonValue.
